snippet: Recent data that suggests the economy is recovering has helped stocks rally, but the January jobs report will test the rally.
abstract: Stock indexes end little changed ahead of monthly employment report.
lead_paragraph: Recent data that suggests the economy is recovering has helped stocks rally, but the January jobs report will test the rally.

headline.seo: Stock Indexes Hold Firm While Tech Shares Advance
headline.main: Indexes Hold Firm While Tech Shares Advance
headline.print_headline: Indexes Hold Firm While Tech Shares Advance
